job_description:
• Join our 30,000 everyday heroes.
• A global technology and professional services company that delivers consulting, technology and mission services to every major agency across the U.
• Government, defense and intelligence community.
• Our 30,000 experts extract the power of technology to create immediate value and deliver solutions at the edge of innovation.
• We operate across 30 countries worldwide, offering leading capabilities in digital modernization, AI/ML, Cloud, Cyber and application development.
• Together with our clients, we strive to create a safer, smarter world by harnessing the power of deep expertise and advanced technology.

production of Life Science products Process work orders accurately using an ERP system in a timely manner Maintenance of production batch records and good documentation under ISO requirement Accurate tracking of production data, test data and inventory Assembly of 10x consumables and finished goods both manually and using semi-automated packaging equipment Ability to set up and operate packaging and escalate issues to supervisor’s or MSE’s attention High school education / Associate Degree or above Strong team player and detail oriented Good communication skills Ability to read and understand SOPs and equipment user manual Ability to enter data into electronic tracking systems like Excel Ability to multi-task and prioritize work load to meet strict deadlines under supervision Good documentation skills and ability to write procedures and reports Desire to be part of a rapidly evolving organization and taking products and processes to the next level Ability to lift up to 15 pounds and potentially stand or sit for up to 3 hour increments Experience in automation and packaging of Life Science products, Food Packaging products or related field preferred Relevant experience in a production environment working with standard production control tools – ERP, inventory control, and work orders Experience training employees on production processes defined in production batch job_title: Growth - AI Workflows, Martech, Creative Systems
job_description:
• Serve as a bridge between marketing, product, growth and technical teams, translating growth objectives into system requirements and scalable solutions.
• 8+ years of growth or marketing technology experience spanning both consumer (B2C) and business (B2B) products, with a track record of designing and scaling AI-driven growth systems.
• Deep knowledge of martech ecosystems and experience working with APIs, event streams, and cloud data warehouses.
• Strong analytical skills with the ability to model funnels, run incrementality studies, and translate data into actionable growth strategies.
• Experience applying AI/ML techniques (e.
• Design and launch AI-powered creative systems (dynamic content generation, automated asset production, experimentation tooling) that enable rapid, personalized campaigns across multiple channels.
• Build and scale a modern martech stack (data pipelines, automation platforms, experimentation frameworks) that supports sophisticated targeting, measurement, and real-time optimization.
• Be scrappy and build MVPs, then partner with engineering to architect 0→1 infrastructure—including APIs, event triggers, and growth tools—that accelerates testing velocity and supports global rollout.
